name: Alice Dupont
bio: Passionate about artificial intelligence and web development, Alice seeks to create innovative and intuitive applications. She has solid experience in React and Python.

name: Bob Martin
bio: An expert in information systems security, Bob specializes in data protection and threat analysis. He enjoys designing robust and secure network architectures.

name: Carla Rodriguez
bio: A creative mobile developer, Carla masters Swift and Kotlin to build fluid user experiences on iOS and Android. She is particularly interested in UX/UI design.

name: David Petit
bio: David transforms raw data into valuable insights. With expertise in R, Python, and Big Data technologies like Spark, he enjoys solving complex problems through data.
